text: (Wọ́n tún wí pé:) “Ẹ má gbàgbọ́ àyàfi ẹni tí ó bá tẹ̀lé ẹ̀sìn yín.” Sọ pé: “Dájúdájú ìmọ̀nà (’Islām) ni ìmọ̀nà ti Allāhu.” (Wọ́n tún wí pé:) “(Ẹ má gbàgbọ́) pé wọ́n fún ẹnì kan ní irú ohun tí Wọ́n fun yín tàbí pé wọn yóò takò yín (tí wọn yó sì jàre yín) lọ́dọ̀ Olúwa yín.” Sọ pé: “Dájúdájú oore àjùlọ wà ní ọwọ́ Allāhu. Ó ń fún ẹni tí Ó bá fẹ́. Allāhu ni Olùgbààyè, Onímọ̀.”
